title: Fix your broken zipper with a plastic straw and super glue
body: This won't work at all. The part that is being replaced by the bit of straw is called the pin. The matching part in the other side is called the box, and in a normally operating zipper the slide pushes the pin inside the box which locks the bottom of the zipper together to prevent it from separating.
